author: ckunz
msg: [Bug 4171388] Create interface VertexOutputFormat and at least one default  [ckunz]

author: aching
msg: [Bug 4188630] Moved the ZooKeeper coordination directory from /tmp to
/tmp/_defaultZkManagerDir and blow away any local job directories in

author: aching
msg: * Big changes to the ZooKeeperManager protocol.
- Wait until all the maps are done with ZooKeeper before stopping servers (through stamps).
- Added becomeMaster() to determine who is the master among processes and a halting protocol when the application is over.
- Fixed multiple bugs in ZooKeeperManager protocol that were not safe.
* Implemented new getChildrenExt() that add useful sequence sorting for children and getting the full path.
* Fixed some comments to be more descriptive.
* Added some fault tolerance for tasks that finish just at the end and then die.
* Augmented unittests to run with 3 mappers when the jobtracker is specified and not using the localjobrunner.

author: aching
msg: [Bug 4180448] Suspects that the ZooKeeper fails to continue when the logs can't be
flushed.  Added a StreamCollector class that collects the STDOUT and
STDERR and dumps it to the LOG.  Now the TestPageRankVertex completes with over 100 supersteps. [aching]
